title: Food Delivery Website
about: Created a user account system that allows registered users to save their preferences and order history for future orders.
aboutPoint: Implemented CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations to allow users to create and manage their accounts, view and edit their profile information, and manage their past and current orders.
Utilized modern web technologies such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and a front-end framework like React js to create an engaging and interactive website.
Developed a responsive layout that adjusts to fit various screen sizes, making the website accessible on desktop, laptop, tablet, and mobile devices.

title: Portfolio
about: Developed a professional portfolio website using modern web technologies to showcase skills, experience, and achievements in a clear and concise manner.
aboutPoint: Created a dedicated section to showcase previous projects in software development, web design, and data analysis, with detailed descriptions, screenshots, and related resources.
Optimized the website to be fully responsive across all devices, including desktops, laptops, tablets, and smartphones.
Demonstrated strong technical skills in web development, including React js, HTML, Css, Javascript, API.

title: Movie Download Website
about: Developed a dynamic website that displays current trending movies, popular movies, and upcoming movies.
aboutPoint: Designed a responsive layout that adjusts to fit various screen sizes, making the website accessible on desktop, laptop, tablet, and mobile devices.
Implemented a search functionality allowing users to search for movies based on title, genre, or release year.
Utilized modern web technologies such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to create an engaging and interactive website.
Utilized an external API to fetch and display movie data, providing a seamless user experience with real-time updates
